title: minitool
author: minitool
content: I have a great business opportunity for you. I reside in Europe and there are many Amazon lockers available here. You can buy items from Amazon and send them to me, and I will receive and sell them. You will receive payment instantly for whatever you send. Our primary focus is on items such as mobile phones, laptops, shoes, etc. We also have a high demand for gift cards such as Google Play, Apple, Netflix, and many more.In addition, we have many clients who come to us to pay their invoices.If you can pay invoices by entering an OTP, we can have a great deal. We are willing to share profits. If you're interested, please contact me on Telegram at https://t.me/nopmnow or @nopmnow.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: minitool on February 13, 2023, 01:45:33 PMYou can buy items from Amazon and send them to me, and I will receive and sell them. You will receive payment instantly for whatever you send. Your account is new, without a commercial record, so how do you ask people to send electronic things to you in the hope that you will sell them and then make profits for them? And what makes people buy from you instead of Amazon? How will you guarantee customer money, and how will you ensure that you will sell those products? How will the profits be shared?Whatever you are trying to present is misleading and unknown.

comments.author: odolvlobo
comments.body: I encourage anyone who might be interested take a look at purse.io. It is a service that allows you to buy from Amazon with bitcoins. I have been using the service for many years.

comments.author: sbrys
comments.body: What is exactly the service you are offering ? Why would people need a middle man for this ?

comments.author: minitool
comments.body: I already tried this site, but it doesn't allow anything outside the .com domain. For example, if I try to buy from Amazon.it, it doesn't work.Quote from: odolvlobo on February 17, 2023, 04:15:18 AMI encourage anyone who might be interested take a look at purse.io. It is a service that allows you to buy from Amazon with bitcoins. I have been using the service for many years.

comments.author: minitool
comments.body: I know that many people have different ways of buying items from various sites like Amazon and Apple, and often need someone to receive and resell the items. I am willing to be that person for them and we can discuss fund safety through private messaging.Quote from: hugeblack on February 16, 2023, 07:11:39 PMQuote from: minitool on February 13, 2023, 01:45:33 PMYou can buy items from Amazon and send them to me, and I will receive and sell them. You will receive payment instantly for whatever you send. Your account is new, without a commercial record, so how do you ask people to send electronic things to you in the hope that you will sell them and then make profits for them? And what makes people buy from you instead of Amazon? How will you guarantee customer money, and how will you ensure that you will sell those products? How will the profits be shared?Whatever you are trying to present is misleading and unknown.

comments.author: Mofough82
comments.body: I’m new and still trying to understand who to trust.   Is there an established person who already provides this service?

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: odolvlobo on February 17, 2023, 04:15:18 AMI encourage anyone who might be interested take a look at purse.io. It is a service that allows you to buy from Amazon with bitcoins. I have been using the service for many years. I second this suggestion.  I admittedly haven't used purse.io in several years, but I have had mostly good experiences with it.  The bad experiences I had all ended up in refunds, so I've never lost anything as a result.  In fact, I've even scored 30% discounts a time or two on big purchases.  If there's something you want but can't quite afford it and are willing to wait, this is a great way to get a massive discount in exchange for waiting and being willing to have the item purchased whenever someone is willing to do so.  This is probably the best thing that Roger Ver has been a part of for this community and I'm glad that it didn't become a Bitcoin Cash only service.
